!!! error TS2318: Cannot find global type 'Array'.

==== esDecorators-classDeclaration-fields-nonStaticAmbient.ts (0 errors) ====
    declare let dec: any;
    
    const field3 = "field3";
    
    class C {
        @dec(1) declare field1: number;
        @dec(2) declare ["field2"]: number;
        @dec(3) declare [field3]: number;
    }
